experiences.title: Software Developer and Consultant
desc: Developed a comprehensive Event Booking Application using Java and Spring Boot. This project showcased your proficiency in Java and Spring Boot technologies and your ability to create a real-world, feature-rich application.
Designed and built client-side routing using react-router-dom
Developed back-end staff in Node.js and Express.js, facilitating data storage and retrieval using MongoDB and Mongoose.
Used in development: Node, Express, Mongoose, JWT, REST APIs, CORS, Helmet, Joi, Multer, Javascript, React, Bootstrap, CSS, JSX,  Git and Github

experiences.title: Java Developer
desc: Developed a comprehensive Event Booking Application using Java and Spring Boot. This project showcased your proficiency in Java and Spring Boot technologies and your ability to create a real-world, feature-rich application.
Designed and implemented the application's core functionality for event creation, booking, and management.
AUtilized Spring Boot to create a robust and scalable backend.ssisted in testing, to ensure application reliability.
Implemented user authentication and authorization using Spring Security, ensuring data security.
Integrated with databases, optimizing performance and data retrieval using Hibernate and JPA.
Employed RESTful APIs to enable seamless communication between frontend and backend components.
Ensured efficient handling of concurrent bookings through multithreading.
Implemented error handling and exception management strategies to enhance application reliability.
Deployed the application on AWS, leveraging EC2 instances and RDS for database management.
Utilized AWS CloudWatch for monitoring and maintaining application health.
